criteria: >80% unit test coverage for new services; All integration tests for APIs passing; Security review of Jint sandbox implementation complete and approved.
success_metrics: Zero critical security findings; All API tests pass.

gate_name: Sprint 2 Quality Gate: Editor & Preview API
criteria: E2E test for script CRUD passes; All integration tests for preview API pass; API documentation in Swagger is complete and accurate.
success_metrics: E2E script creation workflow is functional; Preview API handles all documented error cases correctly.

criteria: E2E tests for preview and versioning workflows pass; Accessibility audit (WCAG 2.1 AA) passes for all new UI; Performance of visual diff component is acceptable.
success_metrics: Key user workflows are intuitive and performant; No critical accessibility issues.

criteria: Prometheus metrics are validated; Audit trail meets compliance requirements; All documentation is published and reviewed; Feature is ready for release.
success_metrics: Feature is observable, auditable, documented, and meets all non-functional requirements.
